post_text: May 19, 2015 at 12:24 PM#1Hi All,I know the define macro to assign speed to effects.But how can I write on that assign speed or rate to seq?

posts.author: justinpma
posts.post_text: May 19, 2015 at 12:24 PM#1Hi All,I know the define macro to assign speed to effects.But how can I write on that assign speed or rate to seq?

posts.author: Michael Storkebaum
posts.post_text: May 20, 2015 at 8:07 PM#2Use this macroline:Assign Executor 1 /Speedmaster=Speed1orAssign Exe 27 /Speedmaster=Speed12

title: macro to assign speed
